input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Vickerman 7.5' Flocked White Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Costway PVC Artificial Christmas Tree Premium Hinged'
  - Name='Costway 7.5 Ft Hinged Unlit Artificial Silver Tinsel Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 10' Full Northern Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Flip Tree'
  - Name='5ft White Unlit Full PVC Regular Artificial Christmas Tree with Solid Metal Stand'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Cathedral Fir Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Lit White Winchester Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='HOMCOM Unlit Snow-Flocked Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches and Tips'
  - Name='National Tree Company 12 ft. Pre-Lit Feel Real Tiffany Fir Slim Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Easy Assembly'
  - Name='National Tree Company Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree Lights'
  - Name='Northlight Pencil Northern Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel-Real Tiffany Fir Slim Tree'
  - Name='Costway 6FT Snow Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree Hinged w/928 Tips'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Fir Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Green Realistic Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Artificial Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 2 ft Natural Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 7.5' Flocked White Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: It is an artificial Christmas tree with similar height and hinged design, but different tree species (spruce vs fir) and flocked vs green; somewhat relevant but not very close.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another fir tree, artificial and narrow silhouette, likely high quality; similar species but narrower shape reduces full-bodied similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway PVC Artificial Christmas Tree Premium Hinged
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A hinged artificial tree like the reference, but description is generic with PVC material; likely similar function but less detailed design info.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 7.5 Ft Hinged Unlit Artificial Silver Tinsel Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While hinged and unlit like the reference, this tree uses silver tinsel material, altering the silhouette and look significantly; less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 10' Full Northern Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A larger, pine species with full body; sturdier and bigger than reference but species and size differ, moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A slim flip artificial tree from a brand known for realism; slimmer than reference's full shape and different species likely; moderate but not close.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 5ft White Unlit Full PVC Regular Artificial Christmas Tree with Solid Metal Stand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full body and metal stand similar to reference but smaller size and white PVC material; some functional similarity but differs in height and color.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Cathedral Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree with realistic construction from a high quality brand; likely similar materials, size, and shape to reference; highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Lit White Winchester Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, lit pine tree with white tips; different species and lit vs unlit difference, but similar construction and quality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HOMCOM Unlit Snow-Flocked Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches and Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim silhouette and snow flocked make it quite different in form and finish from the full Dunhill Fir; less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 12 ft. Pre-Lit Feel Real Tiffany Fir Slim Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand fir tree with hinged branches, but taller and slimmer with pre-lit feature; similar construction but differs in size and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Easy Assembly
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium spruce tree with easy assembly and presumably hinged branches; similar function but different species and possibly silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, fir species, slim silhouette with lights; similar features but slimmer build and lit contrast.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pencil Northern Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pencil (slim) silhouette differs from full-bodied Dunhill Fir; same type of tree species but shape reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Feel-Real Tiffany Fir Slim Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, fir species, slim tree with realistic needles; similar construction but slimmer shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 6FT Snow Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree Hinged w/928 Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size and hinged branch construction; flocked finish differentiates appearance, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same tree name and likely same silhouette and construction as reference though from different brand; very close match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Green Realistic Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Green realistic pine tree; differs in species and possibly shape but similar use and construction qualities.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Artificial Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree similar to reference in species; lacks size and detail info but shares core product features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 2 ft Natural Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Small size (2 ft) and alpine species makes it quite different from the larger full Dunhill Fir; low relevancy.
